lead_paragraph: Haruhiko Kuroda said there was no limit to how much the bank would expand its balance sheet relative to the size of the country's gross domestic product.

headline.main: Central Bank in Japan Has No Ceiling for Asset Purchases, Chief Says
headline.print_headline: Central Bank in Japan Has No Ceiling, Chief Says

snippet: Haruhiko Kuroda said there was no limit to how much the bank would expand its balance sheet relative to the size of the country's gross domestic product.
